name: Potion of Darkness
description: Creates perpetual darkness patches. Blinds everything in it and can cause death.

name: Spellbook of Frost
description: Pulls an Elsa on the target!

name: Leather Armor of Minor Arcane Def
description: Provides minimal defense against arcane attacks.

name: Flocky's Keyboard
description: A dev's best friend! (May or may not have been humped by Flocky)

name: Leather Armor of Minor Def
description: Provides minimal defense against physical attacks.

name: rock
description: It's a rock! It can be thrown :D

name: desk
description: Itsa dessk

name: Stack of Gold Coins
description: Stack of gold coins ( Extremely Valuable )

name: Healing Potion
description: Restores HP ( Area of Effect )

name: Potion of Fire
description: Sets everyone in the radius on FIRE ( Area of Effect )

name: Potion of Teleport
description: Teleports the target to a random location ( Single Target )

name: Potion of Summoning
description: Summons a random friendly monster to AID the player

name: Small Potion of Health
description: Restores HP (Single Target)

name: Scroll of Reveal
description: Reveals the entire map

name: Scroll of Discharge
description: Gives a random amount of damage to all enemies

name: Magic Missile
description: Arcane Projectile (Goes boom when it hits a target)

name: Scroll of Magic Missile
description: Used to cast the Magic Missile spell (Goes boom when it hits a target)

name: Potion of Polimorph
description: Changes the target's appearance and stats into that of another monster.

name: Chain Mail Armor
description: Provides some defense against physical attacks. Useless against most arcane/magic attacks

name: Armor Of the Ranger
description: Decent defense and arcane defense.

name: Armor of Arcane Repulsion
description: A must have piece of armor that protects the wearer from most low-level arcane attacks

name: Armor of the Lucky Summoner
description: This set of armor can only be summoned via a spell/potion! Highly Valuable and powerful.

name: Royal Plated Armor
description: A set of armor with royal insignia. It is said that it was worn by Sir Costi – Duke of Mobility

name: Scroll of Mystical Item
description: A scroll that can summon a rare item into the world.

name: Iron Axe
description: An iron axe.

name: Noldor Quicksilver Sword
description: A quicksilver sword of Noldor craftmanship. Strong but light!

name: Noldor Quicksilver Sword
description: A quicksilver sword of Noldor craftmanship. Strong but light!

name: Ring of Life (+3)
description: Increases the wearers health by 3

name: Necklace of Life Regen
description: Regenerates 1 HP every turn.

description: An iron throwing axe

name: Ring of Life (+6)
description: Increases the wearers health by 6

description: Provides protection against arcane magic and increases health regen.

name: Cloak of the Immortal Mage
description: Provides protection against arcane magic and increases health regen.

name: Cloak of Darkness
description: When used – summons Patches of Darkness if none are present. Else – it will remove them!.

name: Flaming Skull of Corruption
description: When used – it damages everyone in the level. If present in the inventory - it will drain a bit of the player's life every turn.

name: Axe of Regeneration
description: A rare artefact that regens the user's life every turn.

name: Sword of the Arcane
description: A sword forged into the fires of Nepala.

name: Tome of Teleportation
description: The fantasy variant of Get out of Jail Free Card. Quite useful and rare!

name: Gray Goblin Artefact
description: An artefact carried by Gray Goblin Mages. It can be used to damage a creature from afar.

name: Mio's Headphones
description: Mio's Headphones is a rare artefact that – once it is triggered - spawns a magic missile in the wearers inventory.

name: Iron Sword
description: A plain iron sword.

name: Iron Broadsword
description: A plain iron broadsword.

name: Sword of Darkness
description: A sword imbued with darkness. Throwing it kills most enemies and spawn patches of darkness.

name: Steel Arbalet
description: This range weapon doubles the damage of all thrown items and objects.

name: Ring of Life (+25)
description: Increases the wearers health by 6

name: Fire Knight's Armor
description: Extremely high physical and arcane damage reduction.

name: Old Amulet
description: The holy grail – the most sought item – the thing that's worth it

name: Priest Scepter
description: A scepter used by Dae’s Priest to summon creatures that can aid him!

description: A plain iron sword.

description: A plain iron axe! Weights more than a sword but it hits hard when thrown
